anathema: Betray your spouse, disrupt a genuine marriage, prevent a suitor from seeking a partner
edict: Encourage those seeking love, see the beauty in others, support others’ relationships
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Bolka (The Golden Gift)](/Deities.aspx?ID=445)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Encourage those seeking love, see the beauty in others, support others’ relationships

**Anathema** Betray your spouse, disrupt a genuine marriage, prevent a suitor from seeking a partner

**Area of Concern**
Committed relationships, marriage, passion

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=362)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1477)

- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1978)

</column>
name: Bolka (The Golden Gift)
